abstract: Salt Lake City judge reverses temporary order that had stopped Gov Gary R Herbert from blocking federal funding to Planned Parenthood following release of controversial video footage.
lead_paragraph: A judge ruled that Utah can cut off federal funds to Planned Parenthood, a move that Gov. Gary R. Herbert ordered after the release of secretly recorded videos of the group.

headline.main: Utah: Judge Says State Can Block Funding for Planned Parenthood
headline.print_headline: Utah: Judge Says State Can Block Funding for Planned Parenthood

snippet: A judge ruled that Utah can cut off federal funds to Planned Parenthood, a move that Gov. Gary R. Herbert ordered after the release of secretly recorded videos of the group.
